ygData.subject: Switching Protocols - real world experience?
ygData.msgSnippet: I confess that I am deeply curious about the real world use of the 101 (Switching Protocols) status code.  Is this viable in today s firewall environment?

I confess that I am deeply curious about the real world use of the 
101 (Switching Protocols) status code.  Is this viable in today's 
firewall environment?  Does anyone have a roadmap of success and 
failure that they are interested in sharing? 

-bryan
